title: Tech Volunteer
affiliation: UP Association of Computer Science Majors (UP CURSOR)
description: Assisted in the facilitation of UP CURSOR's Tackle 2023: Virtual Tech Expo, a 3-day event that aims to help tech enthusiasts to interact with and learn from industry leaders in technology held via Zoom
Created a script to generate participant statistics for each day of the event and presented them to the event's organisers

title: Program Manager
affiliation: UP Association of Computer Science Majors (UP CURSOR) App Batch 2223A

Responsible for the overall management of the program, including the development of the program flow and its facilitation

title: Automation Developer
affiliation: UP Career Assistance Program for Engineering Students (UP CAPES)
description: Created an internal script that automatically generates bespoke Memorandum of Agreements for the organisation's company partners (Technologies used: Google Apps Script, Google Sheets, Google Docs)

title: Website Manager
description: Led a team in writing and managing over 1,000 directory listings of locksmith, key-cutting, shoe repair, and watch repair in the United Kingdom

Created the frontend and configured the backend of 7 other related websites (Technologies used: WordPress, CSS, Bootstrap)

title: Virtual Assistant
description: Researched and provided educated insights about various topics based on the client’s needs
Reached out to different offices and people to enquire as well as set personal appointments as the client requested

title: Intern
description: Tracked the passing of select micro, weather, and amateur radio satellites
Decoded and processed the data received from passing satellites and logged the information in their database

title: Math Expert
description: Solved and wrote around 200 step-by-step solutions to Algebra and Geometry problems on the Photomath platform
Reviewed the correctness and rated the quality of other Math Experts’ solutions to problems in the same fields

title: High School Student
description: Graduated with High Honours in the Applied Sciences and Engineering Track
